title: Harman | SDE Intern | Remote | Oncampus
content:
Education: B.Tech. (Non CSE, Non Circuital) from Tier 1 college
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: Summer Intern at an MNC
Company: Harman
Title: SDE Intern (Winter Internship)
Location: Remote
Salary: INR 40k per month
Benefits: Employee discount on Harman products like JBL speakers, Infinity headphones, etc.
Other details: Occasional in person meetings at nearby office location. Offices are located in Gurgaon, Bangalore and Pune.

title: Expedia | SDE1 Fresher | Gurgaon | Oncampus
content:
Education: B.Tech. (Non CSE, Non Circuital) from Tier 1 college
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: SDE Intern at Expedia Group (Summer Internship)
Company: Expedia Group
Location: Gurgaon
Title: SDE1 (PPO after intern)
Base Salary: INR 14,50,000
Relocation Bonus: USD 5,000
Equity: USD 15,000 (over 4 years)
Total first yr Comp.: INR 14,50,000 + USD 5,000 + USD 3,750
Benefits: Medical insurance, Wellness benefits, 2 days per week in office, cab service, free food, game room, laptop, mouse, keyboard, etc.
Other details: To be eligible for relocation bonus, your home address on government ID must be more than 80 kms away from office location.

Rejected the offer for a better one.

title: Expedia | SDE Intern | Gurgaon | Oncampus
content:
Education: B.Tech. (Non CSE, Non Circuital) from Tier 1 college
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: None
Company: Expedia Group
Title: SDE Intern (Summer Internship)
Salary: INR 35k per month
Relocation Bonus: USD 250
Benefits: 2 month stay at 3 Star Hotel (with breakfast included), cab service, free food, game room, laptop, mouse, keyboard, etc.
Other details: To be eligible for relocation bonus and hotel stay, your home address on government ID must be more than 80 kms away from office location.

Excellent culture with many team lunches and outings for interns.

Received PPO one month after internship ended!! 🥳

title: VISA | Bangalore | Please Suggest
content:
```

Company: Visa Inc
Title/Level: Data Engineer
Location: Bengaluru
Base Salary: 24lac
Relocation: NA
Signing Bonus: 1lac
Stock bonus: $20k (20:20:60)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock) for Year 1: 24 + 1 + ($4k ~ 3.4lac)  = 28.3lac 
Benefits: Standard Visa Benefits

Other details: Still Evaluating
```
